column4: ok, weird question:  What is the latest build of the kernel for Karmic?  2.6.31-14 or -15?
(my box says the latter, ubuntu.com says the former)
I think she means which of the two "temp" labels is really the CPU
ahh I don't know - I don't know how to monitor cpu temps in linux
how do you monitor the temp any way - what programme does that?
wmtemp doesn't work onmy machine -- got weird errors installing it...
let me look at the man and see if I understand that
no it just does nothing - the task is in the taskbar but nothing comes up - I don't understand what you meant by sensors
wow one is at 143F and the other at 141F
